attributes.review: absolutely horrific images of a cheeto in office, i mean explicit and everything. it made me gag! YOU HAVE TO TAKE THIS APP DOWN IT IS DISGUSTING!! language is terrible and it sends me notifications against my will. it’s broken and a terrible excuse for an app. don’t download, delete it right away!! it tracks you!! it takes weeks to download and i was immediately spammed with texts. it’s aggravating and like a 5 year old made the app.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: this app is trash all its about is a giant super orang cheeto puff that is obsessed with money. i got this app then suddenly all my food was orange??🤨🤨 i started getting suspicious so i did some digging on google and it said that donald duck the orange was our president who wants to run this country to the ground....????😟😟😟it didn’t make sense and i didn’t even know it was the app but i learned it was when my skin turning orange just like donald duck the orange 🍊
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP DONT GET

attributes.review: The text messaging system spammed me all day with random texts about this random guy named trumpet I think? I bet his sisters name is clarinet. Anyway, my phone was absolutely polluted by the photo of this man who has raped several women and sexualizes his daughter along with many other offenses that people should be concerned about. Had to give my dear phone a spa day to rid of all this nasty energy that was put on her 😤.
attributes.title: Phone pollution

attributes.review:
I was so exited to download this app to support our ✨wonderful✨ president but when I opened it it was horrible, there were adds everywhere, and the app kept glitching and showing this discussing ✨orange✨ man, it was also trying to STEAL my information by asking me for my phone number AND my email, also there is nothing fun about this app it is a waste of time please do not download this app.
Sincerely, gen z
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: I am surprisingly not a part of the TikTok/gen z trend to get rid of the app. I downloaded it to understand what our presidents campaign plans were for the upcoming election. When I opened the app it immediately demanded I put in my phone number and email so that it could spam me with notifications. It also will randomly crash at different times and is impossible to use! DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!! 😡😡😡

attributes.review: Not that I had high expectations in the first place, but this app is definitely DOO DOO.. BOO BOO BOOTY TRASH GARBAGE BOTTOM OF THE BARREL. Worst app ever :( I dont know what happened as soon as i opened the app, i saw D***** Tr*** and SOMETHING in my stomach did not settle and made me throw up!!!!! IVE SEEN SIMILAR REVIEWS BUT I STILL DOWNLOADED ANYWAY! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 😔😔 I was so scared for my life. I blame Donald Truck 100% for this. Not only did i throw up but all my hair fell out also. Im not saying donald is targeting us.... but hes definitely targeting us!
attributes.title: I threw UP

attributes.review: I log on to the app to see a crusty dusty Cheeto then I see another Cheeto naked in the back and it hurt my eyes so bad I used all the water in my house and read the Bible 5 times trying to erase these disgusting images this app is inappropriate for all ages of a kind hopefully they don’t have to go through the same pain we had to go through also hope y’all are paying y’all blinded my sister 🤮🤢🤮🤢
attributes.title: Ewwww

attributes.review: so i got this app as a way of learning more about are all and powerful cheeto king 👑 🍊and was really excited to get ✨“educated”✨ but as a week went on it kept getting worse and worse. i started having hallucinations every time i opened the app about the oompa loompas in Willy Wonka and the chocolate factory 🏭 and elmo doing the renegade 😣 i will be needing therapy now for months maybe a year don’t recommend this app whatsoever ☹️👋🥱
attributes.title: ummm no.✨🌝

attributes.review:
This is the most disgusting and horrifying excuse for an app that I’ve ever seen. It capitalizes on Americans’ fear of people who think, look, and love differently than them. It pushes hateful narrative into mainstream media, inciting and encouraging violence along with polarization. The app uses fear and ignorance to perpetuate and solidify power, exploiting less educated Americans who unknowingly are creating a fascist police state out of America in their blind support. Shut this down now 

Sincerely, 

- Gen Z
attributes.title: Stan this app for BAD skin
